com.socialize
Interface SocializeService

All Superinterfaces:
SocializeSessionConsumer
All Known Implementing Classes:
SocializeServiceImpl
public interface SocializeService
extends SocializeSessionConsumer

The main Socialize Service. This is the simplest entry point into the Socialize API.

Author:
Jason Polites

Method Detail

init

IOCContainer init(Context context)
Initializes a SocializeService instance with default settings. Should be called during the onCreate() method of your Activity.

Parameters:
context - The current Android context (or Activity)

init

IOCContainer init(Context context,
                  String... paths)
Initializes a SocializeService instance with custom bean configurations (Expert use Only)

Parameters:
context - The current Android context (Activity)
paths - List of paths to config files. Beans in paths to the right overwrite beans in paths to the left.
See Also:
"https://github.com/socialize/android-ioc"

initAsync

void initAsync(Context context,
               SocializeInitListener listener)
Initializes a SocializeService instance asynchronously with default settings. Should be called during the onCreate() method of your Activity.

Parameters:
context - The current Android context (Activity)
listener - A listener to handle callbacks from the init. Any access to Socialize objects must be done AFTER successful init.

initAsync

void initAsync(Context context,
               SocializeInitListener listener,
               String... paths)
Initializes a SocializeService instance with custom bean configurations (Expert use Only)

Parameters:
context - The current Android context (or Activity)
listener - A listener to handle callbacks from the init. Any access to Socialize objects must be done AFTER successful init.
paths - List of paths to config files. Beans in paths to the right overwrite beans in paths to the left.
See Also:
"https://github.com/socialize/android-ioc"

init

void init(Context context,
          IOCContainer container)
Initializes a socialize service with a custom object container (Expert use only)

Parameters:
context - The current Android context (or Activity)
container - A reference to an IOC container
See Also:
"https://github.com/socialize/android-ioc"

destroy

void destroy()
Destroys the SocializeService instance. Should NOT be called in general use.

destroy

void destroy(boolean force)
Force destroy (Expert only)

Parameters:
force -

authenticateSynchronous

SocializeSession authenticateSynchronous(Context context)
                                         throws SocializeException
Authenticates the application against the API as an anonymous user synchronously. NOTE: This assumes the consumer key/secret have been specified in assets/socialize.properties

Parameters:
context - The current context.
Throws:
SocializeException

authenticate

void authenticate(Context context,
                  SocializeAuthListener authListener)
Authenticates the application against the API as an anonymous user. NOTE: This assumes the consumer key/secret have been specified in assets/socialize.properties

Parameters:
context - The current context.
authListener - The callback for authentication outcomes.

authenticate

void authenticate(Context context,
                  String consumerKey,
                  String consumerSecret,
                  SocializeAuthListener authListener)
Authenticates the application against the API as an anonymous user.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
consumerKey - The consumer key, obtained from registration at http://www.getsocialize.com.
consumerSecret - The consumer secret, obtained from registration at http://www.getsocialize.com.
authListener - The callback for authentication outcomes.

authenticate

@Deprecated
void authenticate(Context context,
                             AuthProviderType authProvider,
                             SocializeAuthListener authListener,
                             String... permissions)
Deprecated. 

Authenticates the application against the API. NOTE: This assumes the consumer key/secret have been specified in assets/socialize.properties

Parameters:
context - The current context.
authProvider - The authentication provider. Use AuthProviderType.SOCIALIZE for anonymous user auth.
authListener - The callback for authentication outcomes.
permissions - One or more custom permissions used by the call. (Currently only used by FACEBOOK)

authenticateForRead

void authenticateForRead(Context context,
                         AuthProviderType authProvider,
                         SocializeAuthListener authListener,
                         String... permissions)
Authenticates the application against the API. NOTE: This assumes the consumer key/secret have been specified in assets/socialize.properties

Parameters:
context - The current context.
authProvider - The authentication provider. Use AuthProviderType.SOCIALIZE for anonymous user auth.
authListener - The callback for authentication outcomes.
permissions - One or more custom permissions used by the call. (Currently only used by FACEBOOK)

authenticateForWrite

void authenticateForWrite(Context context,
                          AuthProviderType authProvider,
                          SocializeAuthListener authListener,
                          String... permissions)
Authenticates the application against the API. NOTE: This assumes the consumer key/secret have been specified in assets/socialize.properties

Parameters:
context - The current context.
authProvider - The authentication provider. Use AuthProviderType.SOCIALIZE for anonymous user auth.
authListener - The callback for authentication outcomes.
permissions - One or more custom permissions used by the call. (Currently only used by FACEBOOK)

authenticate

void authenticate(Context context,
                  String consumerKey,
                  String consumerSecret,
                  AuthProviderInfo authProviderInfo,
                  SocializeAuthListener authListener)
Authenticates the application against the API.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
consumerKey - The consumer key, obtained from registration at http://www.getsocialize.com.
consumerSecret - The consumer secret, obtained from registration at http://www.getsocialize.com.
authProviderInfo - Information about the auth provider to be used. May be null.
authListener - The callback for authentication outcomes.

authenticateKnownUser

void authenticateKnownUser(Context context,
                           UserProviderCredentials userProviderCredentials,
                           SocializeAuthListener authListener)
Authenticates the application against the API as a user known to your app from a given 3rd party provider.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
userProviderCredentials - Information about the user being authed.
authListener - The callback for authentication outcomes.

getSession

SocializeSession getSession()
Returns a reference to the current session.

Returns:
The current session.

clearSessionCache

void clearSessionCache(Context context)
Clears the local cache of session data. This will cause a full authenticate to be required upon the next call to the Socialize API.

clear3rdPartySession

                          AuthProviderType type)
Clears the session of the given 3rd party auth data (logs out from Facebook/Twitter etc).

handleBroadcastIntent

boolean handleBroadcastIntent(Context context,
                              Intent intent)
Handles broadcast messages. Used for push notifications.

Parameters:
context -
intent -
Returns:
True if the broadcast message was handled by Socialize. False if it is a simple registration request or it's not a message for Socialize.
